text:
For the next 6 weeks, I'm going to be building an app for Songlingo.

The app will help people learn languages through songs, on the go!

Any thoughts?

@_buildspace @_nightsweekends @song_lingo #buildinpublic https://t.co/8eLF9VQ13I
